Reviews.Title: hayward
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rowland
Reviews.Content: This is my second Haier TV I purchased a 7" portable model for use during power outages, but it needs a decent outdoor antenna because im in a fringe area, get about 8-10 channels.The 22" model I just purchased was easy to set up has a great picture and sound for a smaller TV.Has numerous custom setting features and can be viewed from a decent angle. The 22" picture is great for a medium size room.I read numerous reviews on 19" TV's and found them to be lacking in one feature or another, I was suprised to see the 22" Haier model so I though I would Try it.Works for me!

Reviews.Title: Good TV, Good Price
Reviews.Author: Ben L
Reviews.Content: We have owned this tv for 3 weeks.  Bought it for our workout room in the basement.  We used the PA730 Peerless wall mount.  Mounted Easy, Setup was Easy.  Packaged and shipped great. Good TV for the price!  I will definitely consider HAIER for other TV purchases in the future.

Reviews.Title: Good quality HD
Reviews.Author: Richard "Richard of Connecticut"
Reviews.Content: Wife uses it to fall asleep--- I love the earphone jack!!Fiddling with the control to get the right shape screen is a bit of a hassle.

Reviews.Title: This is right TV for about $150; but you should consider bad sound quality!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I am using it for two years now.I am almost happy with my purchase (I bought it for about $200 then).I don't like its sound which is internal and weak.

Reviews.Title: not the best, not the worst
Reviews.Author: Greg Zyla "VALLCO Drag Racing  Game"
Reviews.Content: For a second TV in a guest room or kids room, it's fine. Wouldn't recommend as your 'daily viewer.' Picture is OK.Haier HL22R1 22-Inch LCD HDTV
